id.description: The unique identifier of the tenant.

subscription_id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription entry.

email.description: The email address of the tenant.

volume_name.description: The name of the storage volume the data resides on; only applicable if status is not `pending`.

volume_quota.description: The quota assigned to the tenant.

volume_used.description: The amount of storage in use; only applicable if the value is greater than `0`.

volume_available.description: The amount of storage available; only applicable if the value is greater than `0`.

created_at.description: The date the tenant was created.

updated_at.description: The date the tenant was last modified.
